thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 23 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Yantai Tayho Advanced Materials to jointly boost 350 mln yuan capital in Ningxia-based firm with partners

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Yantai Tayho Advanced Materials to jointly boost 350 mln yuan capital in Ningxia-based firm with partners

organizations.name: yantai tayho advanced materials co ltd

text:
Jan 24(Reuters) - Yantai Tayho Advanced Materials Co Ltd
* Says it and partners plan to jointly boost 350 million yuan capital in Ningxia-based new material firm
* Says the company will hold a 67 percent stake in the new material firm
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/AALYKy
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
